ITdepartment: Direktion Technologie und Innovation, Insel Data Science Center
Domain: Software/Application Development,Data Analytics / Business Intelligence,Machine Learning / Data Science
Prerequisites:
IDSC employees are IT workers whose primary job is to prepare data for analytical or operational uses. These software engineers are typically responsible for building data pipelines to bring together information from different source systems. They integrate, consolidate and cleanse data and structure it for use in analytics applications. Typical skills include database management, SQL and Python or any other modern programming language.
IDSC runs its databases on a Microsoft MS SQL Server (MSSQL, SSIS, SSRS) system.
Description:
In 2016, the Inselspital merged with Spital Netz Bern AG to form the Insel Gruppe AG. This creates the largest and leading medical care system in Switzerland.

With its six locations in the canton of Bern

the Inselspital, University Hospital Bern
Bern Rehabilitation Center Heiligenschwendi
the Tiefenau City Hospital
the regional hospitals Belp , Riggisberg  and Aarberg
The island group combines basic care with top university medicine and teaching with research .

Around 860,000 patients from a wide variety of nations are treated in the island group every year . The Insel Group stands for the highest quality of treatment. The core of their service offering is the graduated care model in which patients receive the optimal treatment for them at the best location and in the shortest possible time. As hospitals with a public care mandate, their facilities are open to all patients. The highly specialized Inselspital provides access to the latest developments and methods in all areas of medicine at all times.

With over 10,000 employees, the Insel Group is one of the largest employers in the Bern region. In addition, the hospital network is the most important further training institution for young doctors and a top training company for a variety of professions.

Description: Iterative is a software development company in Bern, we concentrate on the essentials and communicate honestly.  You can find various news about Iterativ here: www.iterativ.ch/news You can find information about our projects here: www.iterativ.ch/projekte

KPT Health Insurance has been in existence for over 125 years. Customer satisfaction and innovation are the driving forces of KPT. KPT’s customer care has received multiple awards. With its own KPT Lab, the insurer has been creating successful and innovative products for years, to cover the individual needs of its customers.

With a premium volume of CHF 1.7 billion and 428,000 insured private individuals, KPT is one of the ten largest health insurers in Switzerland.

Prerequisites: Will be provided as soon as we have more clarity about it.
Description:
As a self-organized digital agency, we stand for digital progress made in Switzerland. And what does that mean? What sets us apart as Liip?

We have 15 years of experience in developing, implementing and consulting for digital solutions. We support customers in achieving not only more, but also more meaningful and sustainable digital change.

Prerequisites:
University degree, preferably in Computer Science or Engineering
Experience in Software Engineering, with proficiency in at least one object-oriented language
Basic proficiency in German (B1 level or better, if possible)
Willingness to work on-site in Fahrweid for 80-100% of the time, with a maximum of 2 days of remote work
Description:
M&F Engineering is the Industry 4.0 specialist for competent software-development, IoT and customized testing systems. We assume responsibility for individual software modules up to a complete system or work on-siter on our customers' projects. We further offer a unique trainee program in Switzerland, which brings together innovative technology companies and young software engineers.

The company is owned by the management and is successful since over 30 years. With our 40 employees and a very low fluctuation, we can successfully support our customers in the long term and maintain, expand and further develop their systems.

We need someone that could work with a team that have several expertise, in frontend backend and devops

javascripts, nuxt.js node. vue.js and ruby on rails, Go.
Description: On is an athletic shoe and performance sportswear company originating in Switzerland that designs and markets sports clothing and running shoes. As of 2019 the company held 40% of the running shoe market in Switzerland and 10% in Germany.

ITdepartment: Software Delivery & Operations under Tax and Legal Services (TLS) Line of Service
Domain: Web Development,DevOps,Microsoft Power Platform,AWS / Cloud Services,Cyber Security
Prerequisites:
The Software Delivery & Operations team in PwC Switzerland turns business innovative ideas into scalable, sustainable, and profitable custom software and digital assets.
Main expertise of the team is build web application, mainly SaaS solutions that support the business both internally and externally.
The team is involved end-to-end delivery and operations and cover the entire DevSecOps lifecycle of an application, and follow industry DevSecOps and Agile best practises to deliver those solutions.

As part of this team, a new team member would be mentored and coached by Engineer Leads with a strong Software Engineer knowledge as well as the humans skills required to manage development teams and work with the business colleagues to build and run the digital assets.

Given the scope of the involvement in this team, a new team member is exposed to various amount of areas as part of the delivery & operations cycle.
Here are some examples:
- Requirements engineering
- Implementation of new features, changes and bug fixes
- Software architecture design
- Infrastructure Design and Cloud Architecture (Microsoft Azure Cloud)
- DevSecOps Engineering: best practises, automation, CI/CD pipelines, etc
- Web security best practises
- Team management and hiring new development team member
- Production readiness: operation, support model, incident management, etc

I have selected Microsoft Power Platform as well because this is the low code/no code area where we are ramping up with to gain more capabilities and experience in the team. That would also be potentially beneficial to leverage on such knowledge, even though not main expertise of the team.
Description: At PwC, our purpose is to build trust in society and solve important problems. We’re a network of firms in 157 countries with over 276,000 people who are committed to delivering quality in assurance, advisory and tax services. PwC Switzerland has over 3,300 employees and partners in 14 locations in Switzerland and one in the Principality of Liechtenstein.

Prerequisites: Git and SQL with fluency, Python is a plus.
